casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Eugene REED, II. No. 232P01-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2004. Mark L. Killian, Newton, for Reed. James C. Gaither, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of March 2004 by Attorney General to Extend Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 12th day of March 2004 to file his/her response with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2004."
